full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RDO RJE MI 'KHRUGS PA'I SGO NAS SDIG SGRIB DAG TSUL ZLA BA'I 'OD ZER CAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , ` DAM TSIG SDOM PA DAG BYED THUN DRUG GI RNAL 'BYOR ME TOG 'PHRENG MDZES ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , ` TSE RABS KUN TU TSUL KHRIMS RNAM DAG PA BSRUNG NUS PA'I SMON TSIG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA MKHAN PO BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GYI DGE SGRUB PA NYER BA BSTAN PA YAR 'PHEL GYIS @004A *, ,STOBS BZHI'I BSHAGS PA BSDAMS BYED TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR, ^ SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DI'I MTSAN NI ZLA BA'I 'OD ZER CAN ZHES BYA'O,, ,,)
